article_title: St. Jude Gets FDA Warning Letter For Atlanta Facility
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: st, jude, gets, fda, warning, letter, atlanta, facility

og.description: The health regulator warned the company that its product and production methods may not meet current requirements.
